channel.title: Ip banning players with routers?
channel.description: ok i can ban a player with a normal ip like 123.456.789.10 or whatever but i cant ban a player with a router how do i do it? is there a special programme u need?

item.title: Ip banning players with routers?

item.title: Ip banning players with routers?
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

[quote=“csrsniper254, post:5, topic:49143”]Ill just post the code. Give me 3 min.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2007, 08:40:55 PM[/size][hr]if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
if((victim.equalsIgnoreCase(“localhost”)) || (victim.equalsIgnoreCase(“Put your IP address here!”)) || (victim.equalsIgnoreCase(“Put your router IP here!”))) {
sendMessage(“You can not IP ban the owner!”);
}
else {
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is IP banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully IP banned”);
appendToIp(victim);
}
}[/quote]
Nope that wont work, guaranteed.And your 100% wrong about Lothy being able to login to peoples server and be admin.Thats with his source not the tut.His tut is on Banning and i check the coding.
Check the tut section up and down for Lothys tut.It isnt on the tut list so dont check there.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning players with routers?
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

Ill just post the code. Give me 3 min.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2007, 08:40:55 PM[/size][hr]if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
if((victim.equalsIgnoreCase(“localhost”)) || (victim.equalsIgnoreCase(“Put your IP address here!”)) || (victim.equalsIgnoreCase(“Put your router IP here!”))) {
sendMessage(“You can not IP ban the owner!”);
}
else {
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is IP banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully IP banned”);
appendToIp(victim);
}
}

Read full topic
